TopicTitle: Would people enjoy a Kerbal Super Hero?

Articles.Content:
I made an set of Iron Man armor for Jeb, which can be seen HERE and a last week some Batvehicles, which can be seen HERE

But I'm wondering about which one of the human but rich and gadget-ed up heroes suits KSP more Batman or Iron Man?

Would you like to see bit of a longer action sequence of a KSP version of said heroes? Does anyone have any ideas or want to help, let me know here or in a PM.
I would love to see more Battman!
As we already have Batt-Man in game, I vote for iron Jeb
We have kirrim as the depiction of 007

I thought Jebediah already was a super hero..

Iron Jeb could work though

I couldn't be sure just based on those two names, but as r_rolo pointed out there are already references to Batt-Man so it'd be funny if perhaps it was the analogue of Wayne Enterprises and the Batt-Man CEO decided to be a superhero - but then again, perhaps it'd be ironic if he dressed up as something else.

:shrug:

...whatever happened to Spiderkerbal, Khor the Kod of Explosions, and The Inkredible Kulk?

There is no need for super heroes.

We got Kirrim Kerman.

Richard Branson.

No, I'll only watch videos if they are short and show something specific.
I don't know why, but an Iron Man Kerbal just make more sense for some reason. Jet black just isn't a very Kerbal color. Iron Jeb!

I couldn't be sure just based on those two names, but as r_rolo pointed out there are already references to Batt-Man so it'd be funny if perhaps it was the analogue of Wayne Enterprises and the Batt-Man CEO decided to be a superhero - but then again, perhaps it'd be ironic if he dressed up as something else.

:shrug:

...whatever happened to Spiderkerbal, Khor the Kod of Explosions, and The Inkredible Kulk?

Does the Inkredible Kulk sport a mighty collection of tattoos? Also what colour does a kerbal hulk turn?

Does the Inkredible Kulk sport a mighty collection of tattoos? Also what colour does a kerbal hulk turn?

Surely he becomes human looking?
